metadata.coverageApproach: Systematic categorization ensuring every verse is included

topics.name: Allah's Names & Attributes (Asma ul-Husna)
topics.description: Comprehensive collection of verses mentioning Allah's 99 beautiful names and divine attributes throughout the Quran.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
ayahs.translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

ayahs.text: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ
ayahs.translation: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed.

ayahs.text: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ
ayahs.translation: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection.

topics.name: Monotheism & Unity of Allah (Complete Tawhid)
topics.description: All verses establishing Allah's oneness, rejecting polytheism, and affirming pure monotheism.

ayahs.text: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
ayahs.translation: Say, He is Allah, [who is] One.

ayahs.text: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
ayahs.translation: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

ayahs.text: وَإِلَٰهُكُمْ إِلَٰهٌ وَاحِدٌ ۖ لَّا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.translation: And your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

topics.name: All Prophets & Messengers (Complete Collection)
topics.description: Stories, teachings, and mentions of all 25 prophets named in the Quran, plus references to others.

ayahs.text: إِنَّا أَوْحَيْنَا إِلَيْكَ كَمَا أَوْحَيْنَا إِلَىٰ نُوحٍ وَالنَّبِيِّينَ مِن بَعْدِهِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], as We revealed to Noah and the prophets after him.

ayahs.text: مَّا كَانَ مُحَمَّدٌ أَبَا أَحَدٍ مِّن رِّجَالِكُمْ وَلَٰكِن رَّسُولَ اللَّهِ وَخَاتَمَ النَّبِيِّينَ
ayahs.translation: Muhammad is not the father of [any] one of your men, but [he is] the Messenger of Allah and last of the prophets.

topics.name: Quran & Divine Revelation (Complete Study)
topics.description: Every verse about the Quran itself, revelation process, divine books, and scriptural guidance.

ayahs.text: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayahs.translation: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.

ayahs.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا الذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُ لَحَافِظُونَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.

topics.name: Complete Worship & Rituals (All Acts of Ibadah)
topics.description: Prayer, fasting, hajj, zakat, dhikr, and all forms of worship mentioned in the Quran.

ayahs.text: وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَارْكَعُوا مَعَ الرَّاكِعِينَ
ayahs.translation: And establish prayer and give zakah and bow with those who bow.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الصِّيَامُ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, decreed upon you is fasting.

topics.name: Complete Afterlife & Eschatology
topics.description: Death, barzakh, resurrection, judgment, paradise, hell, and all aspects of the hereafter.

ayahs.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ذَائِقَةُ الْمَوْتِ
ayahs.translation: Every soul will taste death.

ayahs.text: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
ayahs.translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.

topics.name: Complete Moral & Ethical Guidance
topics.description: All moral teachings, character development, and ethical principles in the Quran.

ayahs.text: وَقَضَىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوا إِلَّا إِيَّاهُ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا
ayahs.translation: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you.

topics.name: Complete Social Relations & Community
topics.description: Family, marriage, community, social justice, and all interpersonal relations.

ayahs.text: وَمِنْ آيَاتِهِ أَنْ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا لِّتَسْكُنُوا إِلَيْهَا
ayahs.translation: And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them.

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ
ayahs.translation: The believers are but brothers.

topics.name: Complete Knowledge & Wisdom Collection
topics.description: All verses about seeking knowledge, wisdom, reflection, and intellectual development.

ayahs.text: اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
ayahs.translation: Read in the name of your Lord who created.

ayahs.text: وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
ayahs.translation: And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.'

topics.name: Complete Economic & Legal Guidance
topics.description: All economic principles, legal rulings, inheritance, business ethics, and financial guidance.

ayahs.text: وَأَحَلَّ اللَّهُ الْبَيْعَ وَحَرَّمَ الرِّبَا
ayahs.translation: But Allah has permitted trade and forbidden usury.

ayahs.text: يُوصِيكُمُ اللَّهُ فِي أَوْلَادِكُمْ
ayahs.translation: Allah instructs you concerning your children.

topics.name: Complete Creation & Natural World
topics.description: Universe creation, natural phenomena, animals, plants, and environmental stewardship.

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ حَيٍّ
ayahs.translation: And We made from water every living thing.

ayahs.text: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
ayahs.translation: And the earth - He laid it for the creatures.

topics.name: Complete Historical Narratives
topics.description: All stories of past nations, historical events, and lessons from previous civilizations.

ayahs.text: لَقَدْ كَانَ فِي قَصَصِهِمْ عِبْرَةٌ لِّأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
ayahs.translation: There was certainly in their stories a lesson for those of understanding.

ayahs.text: نَتْلُو عَلَيْكَ مِن نَّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرْعَوْنَ بِالْحَقِّ
ayahs.translation: We recite to you from the news of Moses and Pharaoh in truth.

topics.name: Complete Spiritual Development
topics.description: All aspects of spiritual growth, dhikr, dua, taqwa, and inner purification.

ayahs.text: أَلَا بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ الْقُلُوبُ
ayahs.translation: Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured.

ayahs.text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
ayahs.translation: He has succeeded who purifies it.

topics.name: Complete Behavioral & Conduct Guidance
topics.description: Speech ethics, honesty, modesty, social behavior, and personal conduct.

ayahs.text: وَقُل لِّعِبَادِي يَقُولُوا الَّتِي هِيَ أَحْسَنُ
ayahs.translation: And tell My servants to say that which is best.

ayahs.text: قُل لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَغُضُّوا مِنْ أَبْصَارِهِمْ
ayahs.translation: Tell the believing men to reduce [some] of their vision.

topics.name: Contemporary Issues & Timeless Guidance
topics.description: Verses with guidance applicable to modern challenges and contemporary issues.

ayahs.text: مَن قَتَلَ نَفْسًا بِغَيْرِ نَفْسٍ أَوْ فَسَادٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ فَكَأَنَّمَا قَتَلَ النَّاسَ جَمِيعًا
ayahs.translation: Whoever kills a soul unless for a soul or for corruption [done] in the land - it is as if he had slain mankind entirely.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِّن قَوْمٍ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people.

coverageStrategy.approach: Multi-layered categorization ensuring no verse is left uncategorized
coverageStrategy.overlappingTopics: Verses can belong to multiple relevant topics
